gameplay.strategy_overview:
Overall Playstyle:

Cloak and Dagger are a unique dual-character Strategist, requiring seamless swaps between Dagger (healing focus) and Cloak (damage/utility focus). Dagger sustains with bouncing Lightforce Daggers (LMB), Veil of Lightforce (E - healing wall), and Dagger Storm (RMB - healing field). Cloak offers offensive pressure with Darkforce Cloak (LMB - lock-on beam), blinds/vulns with Terror Cape (E), and grants team invulnerability/invisibility with Dark Teleportation (RMB - shroud). Mastering frequent, strategic swaps is fundamental.

Dagger typically operates from the backline, providing consistent ranged healing. Cloak's positioning is more fluid, moving to protect allies, engage, or strategically deploy his shroud. Dark Teleportation (shroud) is exceptionally powerful for negating enemy ultimates with precise timing. Their shared ultimate, Eternal Bond (Q), involves three dashes creating a heal/damage aura, useful for objective pushes and area control. Effective cooldown management across both characters' kits is paramount. Prioritize healing with Dagger as the primary function, using Cloak for strategic damage and utility as situations demand. Swapping to Cloak auto-reloads Dagger's weapon.



Key Combos & Ability Usage:
  • Dagger Healing Burst:
    Deploy Veil of Lightforce (E) immediately followed by Dagger Storm (RMB). This provides an initial burst heal from the veil, followed by sustained healing over time from the storm, maximizing healing on a target or group.

  • Cloak Debuff to Dagger Damage:
    As Cloak, apply Terror Cape (E) to enemies (blind & vulnerability) → Quickly switch to Dagger (LShift) → Follow up with accurate Lightforce Daggers (LMB) to capitalize on debuffed targets.

  • Cloak Aggressive Reposition/Shroud:
    As Cloak, use Dark Teleportation (RMB) to reposition aggressively into the enemy backline or to shroud key allies during enemy ultimates → Switch back to Dagger (LShift) if healing is needed, or maintain Cloak for pressure.

  • Lightforce Dagger (LMB - Dagger) Utility:
    Remember these daggers bounce and have a homing effect, allowing healing/damage around corners and on mobile targets. Swapping to Cloak automatically reloads them.

  • Dark Teleportation (RMB - Cloak) - Ultimate Negation:
    This is a game-changing ability. Time its use precisely to enshroud your team, making them invulnerable and invisible to negate high-impact enemy ultimates (e.g., from Jeff, Iron Man, Magneto, Scarlet Witch, Venom).

Matchup Considerations:
  • Favorable Against: Characters with evasive movement or flight (Dagger's homing daggers track well). Can counter Doctor Strange's dive with Dagger's healing bubble. Invisible Woman (Cloak can lock on/track; Dagger's bubble negates attacks). Teams reliant on predictable ultimates that Cloak's shroud can negate. Brawl compositions with less mobile tanks (Eternal Bond provides good AoE heal/damage).

  • Challenging Against: Splash damage characters (AoE is hard to avoid due to C&D's slower speed). Hulk (his ultimate can counter Eternal Bond). Black Panther (can block Dagger's healing shots). Scarlet Witch (her ultimate can counter Eternal Bond). Heroes with strong area denial or persistent CC can limit mobility and swaps.

  • Key Synergies: Works well with teams that can capitalize on the windows of opportunity created by Cloak's utility (e.g., shroud allowing safe aggression) or Dagger's sustained healing.

Core Strengths:
  • Versatile Dual Forms: Distinct healer (Dagger) and DPS/utility (Cloak) modes adaptable to team needs.
  • Ultimate Negation (Cloak): Dark Teleportation (RMB) can completely negate enemy ultimates with precise timing.
  • Auto-Aim Healing (Dagger): Lightforce Daggers (LMB) are forgiving and can bounce, increasing healing reach.
  • Strong Healing Output (Dagger): Capable of sustaining teams through prolonged engagements.
  • Backline Defense (Cloak): Effective against divers with close-range damage and shroud protection.
  • AoE Heal/Damage Ultimate: Eternal Bond (Q) is valuable for team pushes and objective control.
  • Independent Cooldowns: Use an ability with one, swap, and immediately use an ability with the other.
  • Automatic Reload Mechanic: Swapping to Cloak reloads Dagger's weapon.
weaknesses: Susceptible to dives as she lacks any form of mobility outside of her Ultimate.
Lightforce Dagger doesn't auto-lock on deployable units, such as Moon Knight's Ancient Ankh or Peni Parker's Bionic Spider-Nest.
Veil of Lighforce does not pass through walls or other terrain.
They can still be damaged and taken down during Eternal Bond.
In addition, on certain maps with high terrain inclinations, Cloak & Dagger may get stuck during the dashes.

Darkforce Cloak has limited range, requiring Cloak to get into mid-close range. This, combined with his low max health, can make it risky to engage directly against enemies without the rest of the team.
Very vulnerable if Dark Teleportation is on cooldown.
In addition, this ability's effects only last for 2 seconds.
Terror Cape's blinding effect only lasts for 1.5 seconds.

lore_details.ingame_bio_quote: "We are Cloak and Dagger. We are hope and fear."
lore_details.ingame_bio_text: Tyrone Johnson and Tandy Bowen are nearly inseparable, like two sides of the same coin. Intertwined by forces of shadow and light, Cloak & Dagger fight as a united front, dealing havoc and healing allies across the arena.

hero_stories.title: A Brief Farewell
hero_stories.content:
The back alleys of New York City had never been safe. Back when Tyrone Johnson and Tandy Bowen were just teenage runaways, they'd found themselves fighting to survive the cruel realities of living on the streets. When they gained their superpowers, becoming the crime fighting duo known as Cloak and Dagger, they vowed to shed a little light — and darkness — on the most dangerous corners of the city so that no one else would ever have to live in fear again.
But now, fear had taken over — not just in the alleys, but across the entire island of Manhattan.
Dracula, the Lord of the Vampires, had come to town, and had somehow managed to lock the Big Apple in a state of eternal night. His bloodsucking minions were on a rampage, and there were only a few heroes left to protect the innocent citizens of NYC from being involuntarily drafted into the vampire army's ranks.

changes: Cloak & Dagger were released as the 32nd character to be introduced to Marvel Rivals as a Strategist hero.
Added 2 new costumes: Lemon Lime and Growth & Decay.
Added the Symphony of Light and Dark achievement.
Added to the Lunar Force Team-Up Ability with Moon Knight.
Reduce Dagger Storm cooldown from 15s to 12s.
Increase the number of dashes in Eternal Bond from 3 to 4.
Resolved an issue where, while using their ultimate, if being frozen by Luna Snow, Cloak & Dagger would remain frozen even after taking damage. They can now break free from Luna's icy grips!
Increase the energy cost to activate Eternal Bond from 3400 to 4000.
The healing amount of each segment will be increased from 220/s to 250/s, the duration will be reduced from 10s to 8s, and the pause time between segments decrease from 1s to 0.67s.
Now, the healing effect from each segment will not stack; when overlapping, only one healing effect is applied.
Additionally, camera control is unlocked during the activation of Eternal Bond.
Increase the Vulnerability inflicted on enemies by Terror Cape from 20% to 28%.
Added 1 new costume: Twilight Duo.
Increase the healing effect from Lightforce Dagger on hit allies from 10 to 16.
Reduce the spell field healing amount generated by the hit from 18 to 16.
Fixed an issue where Cloak or Dagger sometimes left their character model lingering for a brief moment during form switches. Now, they'll slip into action smoother than a stealthy shadow.

After activating Eternal Bond, the duration of the first three healing zones will no longer be calculated separately; instead, they will remain active until the duration of the final healing zone ends, at which point all will be removed together.
Added 1 new costume: Dance Partner.
As Cloak, increase the damage of the Darkforce Cloak from 75/s to 80/s.
As Dagger, increase the damage of the Lightforce Dagger on hit from 15 to 18.
We've zapped a bug where their ultimate would sneakily still do damage to foes protected by Magneto's Iron Bulwark or Hulk's Indestructible Guard—talk about an unexpected plot twist!

lore_details.official_quote: "There's always a spark of light in darkness."
lore_details.official_description: Cloak & Dagger are a duo of Strategist heroes in Marvel Rivals, and are collectively the 32nd hero introduced to the game's roster. They have a team-up ability that works in conjunction with Moon Knight.
